name: my body is your body is our body is
name_original: my body is your body is our body is
description:
/// THIS GAME IS NSFW AND 18+ ///

A role playing game for two or three or four or five or six or seven or eight (or nine or ten or...) people who are trans and fucking and raging raging raging against the killing of their light

Hello, and welcome to your MECHA.

Created as part of #TRANSFUCKINGRAGEJAM

A big thank you to all the wonderful folks in the transfuckingragejam discord server. You are all wonderful and inspiring and amazing.

Special thanks to the jam runner, Star Gazer Sasha. Play Her Games Or Else.

Special thanks also to Valentine, for cursing me with the idea of this game, and Logan, for editing and cheering me on. Play Both Of Their Games Also Or Else (x2 this time).
